speaker: player
text: Hey! Who are you? What are you doing in there?

speaker: other
text: I'm so glad to see you! My name is SPEAKER_FIRST. I should never have come here... I was taken captive by the devil at his will!

speaker: other
text: Please, help me! You'll have to defeat the guards first, and then unlock the cell.

speaker: other
text: Please, help me! You'll need to use a key verse to unlock the cell.
